price: Kuma a lõkacin da ya isa mafi ƙarfinsa, Muka bã shi hukunci da ilmi. Kuma kamar wancan ne Muke sãka wa mãsu kyautatãwa.
arabic: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walammā balagha ashuddahu ātaynāhu ḥuk'man waʿil'man wakadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
